Articles.Content:
I've been reading some posts lately regarding 0.22, and there's word around that the update will destroy saves.

I just got finished building my first real space station, and don't want to lose it.

Anyone know for sure?
Sandbox saves will be ok, most likely, that's the only game mode now. If you want to play career, you have to start a new game.

Sandbox saves should be fine. But if you want to play with R&D features you will need to make a career mode save for it.

Edited October 13, 2013 by jcraft
I'd recommend backing up all of your .craft files and save-games just to be sure.
Um, the orange dish-shaped antenna seems to have been replaced by a new one... That may cause some problems, and a landing leg was also replaced.

Um, the orange dish-shaped antenna seems to have been replaced by a new one... That may cause some problems, and a landing leg was also replaced.

No, those two parts are still in the game, the new dish and landing leg are two completely different, and entirely new, parts.

No, those two parts are still in the game, the new dish and landing leg are two completely different, and entirely new, parts.

That is not true.

I know the old landing leg is still in there they just added a new one.

Idk about the old dish don't think ive seen it in any of the videos.

Edit:

Edited October 14, 2013 by Vaka_maka
From what I've seen the old landing legs and the dish have been removed which will cause problems with craft files. Also the new dish looks bigger so it won't look as good on the tiny satallites.
